mapper.insert: insert into work( work_no, work_id, work_name, work_genre, work_sub_genre, work_prefer, work_wtime, work_paid, work_contract, work_book, work_subtotal ) values ( #{workNo}, #{workId}, #{workName}, #{workGenre}, #{workSubGenre}, #{workPrefer}, #{workWtime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{workPaid}, #{workContract}, #{workBook}, #{workSubtotal} )
mapper.select: select * from work order by work_no desc
mapper.update: update work set work_id=#{workName}, work_genre=#{workGenre}, work_sub_genre=#{work} where work_no=#{workNo},
